election_record.label: Massachusetts 1820 Constitutional Convention, Boston

overview.note: "The whole number of tickets given in was 1708, necessary to make a choice 855." Town Records. Boston, 161 - 164.
The Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA) and Boston Daily Advertiser (Boston, MA) list 1378 votes for Isaac Parker.

"There were 1285 votes for Hon. Isaac Parker, 193 for Isaac Parker - total 1478. For his Honor Wm. Phillips 1503 - Wm. Phillips 191 - total 1694." Boston Daily Advertiser (Boston, MA). October 17, 1820.
Josiah Rainsford received 5 votes as Josiah C. Rainsford.
Patrick T. Jackson received 1 vote as Patrick Jackson.
William E. Channing received 2 vote as William Channing.
William Foster, Jr. received 1 vote as William Foster.

election_record.reference: New-England Palladium and Commercial Advertiser (Boston, MA). October 17, 1820.
Columbian Centinel. American Federalist (Boston, MA). October 18, 1820.
